H0.text: Solid is the state of the inner core of Earth due to extreme pressure.

H1.text: Liquid is the state of the inner core of Earth due to extreme pressure.

H2.text: Gas is the state of Earth's inner core due to extreme pressure.

H3.text: Plasma is the state of matter that the inner core of Earth is in due to extreme pressure.

A4.text: Since this layer is able to transmit shear waves (transverse seismic waves), it must be solid.

A5.text: The sample was observed with x-rays, and strongly supported the theory that Earth's inner core was made of giant crystals running north to south.
